foreignData.name: Endmuräne
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein farbloses Mana.
{2}, {T}, opfere die Endmuräne: Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einem Standardland und bringe diese Karte getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach Deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Moraine frontale
foreignData.text:
{T}: Ajoutez un mana incolore à votre réserve.
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez la Moraine frontale : Cherchez une carte de terrain de base dans votre bibliothèque et mettez cette carte en jeu engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

name: Terminal Moraine
originalText:
oc
T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
o2, oc
T, Sacrifice Terminal Moraine: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terminal Moraine: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
